name: Offroad Cruiser
description:
Is a real physics engine game and simulator.
Ever wanted to try a luxury car simulator and city driving?
Now you can drive, drift and feel a off-road car for free!
Accurate physics engine that can deliver the most realistic racing fun possible.


****GAME FEATURES****
- Real dynamic game feeling with endless fun.
- Destruction of a vehicle.
- Easy controller.
- Realistic acceleration.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Accurate physics.
